faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About LipSyncVideo
faq.description: Have another question? Contact our support team for assistance.

items.title: What is AI lip sync and how does it work?
items.description: AI lip sync technology analyzes your video and audio files to automatically synchronize lip movements with speech. Our advanced AI models create natural, realistic mouth movements that perfectly match the audio track.

items.title: What video and audio formats do you support?
items.description: We support popular video formats (MP4, MOV, AVI) and audio formats (MP3, WAV, AAC). Videos can be up to 4K resolution, and we automatically optimize files for the best processing results.

items.title: How long does it take to process a video?
items.description: Processing time depends on video length and quality settings. Most videos are completed within 3-5 minutes. You'll receive real-time progress updates and email notifications when your video is ready.

items.title: Is my content secure and private?
items.description: Yes, we take security seriously. All files are encrypted during upload and processing. Videos are automatically deleted after 24 hours, and we never store or share your content. We're GDPR compliant and follow industry security standards.

items.title: How does the credit system work?
items.description: Credits are consumed based on video quality and length. Low quality costs 5 credits, medium 10 credits, high 20 credits, and ultra 30 credits. New users get 50 free credits to start, and you can purchase more anytime.

items.title: Can I use this for commercial projects?
items.description: Absolutely! Our Professional and Enterprise plans include full commercial usage rights. You can use the generated videos for marketing, education, entertainment, or any business purpose without restrictions.
